Uses of Interface
com.sap.conn.jco.JCoExtendedFieldMetaData

  • Packages that use JCoExtendedFieldMetaData 
    Package Description
    com.sap.conn.jco
    Contains the major part of the interfaces and factories that an application for JCo is typically dealing with.

    • Uses of JCoExtendedFieldMetaData in com.sap.conn.jco

      JCoExtendedFieldMetaData JCoField.getExtendedFieldMetaData()

      Returns the extended field metadata object at the specified index.
      JCoExtendedFieldMetaData JCoMetaData.getExtendedFieldMetaData(String fieldName)
      Returns the extended metadata object for the field with the specified name.
